description:
Powerful, easy-to-use authoring tool for creating virtual environments.


This update to Turbo Studio includes the following improvements and bug fixes:
- The Turbo VM is updated to version 25.10.4
- Improved performance of applications in environments with slow file IO
- Improved performance of applications with sandbox contention
- Support for window title prefix configuration
- Support for window border configuration
- Support for additional proxy hostname resolution settings
- Fixed sandbox move operations across sandbox boundaries
- Fixed security warnings by loading Turbo DLLs from @SYSTEM@
- Fixed issues with isolated CLSID for CoCreateInstance
- Fixed non-system root drives to no longer honor ForceWriteCopyIsolation setting
- Fixed support for Windows SxS relative assembly references
- Fixed inheritable section handle creation
